titles.title: Manage VA Act
Manage VA Act
To amend title 38, United States Code, to establish in the Department of Veterans Affairs an Under Secretary for Management, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations.

bill.summary:
Manage VA Act
This bill establishes within the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) the position of Under Secretary for Management.
Under the bill, the Under Secretary for Management must serve as the Chief Management Officer of the VA and the principal advisor to the Secretary on matters related to the management of the VA.
